trans-unit.source: Specifies that <xref href="System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer"></xref> will not serialize the public property or public field.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer"></xref>将不进行序列化的公共属性或公共字段。

trans-unit.source: If you apply ScriptIgnoreAttribute to a public property or public field of a class, then <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer> ignores, or skips, the member when serializing an instance of the class to JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) format.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将 ScriptIgnoreAttribute 应用于的公共属性或公共字段的类，然后<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>忽略，或跳过序列为 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 格式的类的实例时的成员。</xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The ScriptIgnoreAttribute will have no effect if the <xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.ResponseFormat%2A> property is set to `Xml`.
trans-unit.target: ScriptIgnoreAttribute 将产生任何影响，如果<xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.ResponseFormat%2A>属性设置为`Xml`。</xref:System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute.ResponseFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to have the same behavior when serializing to XML format, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute> should be applied to the property or field instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要为 XML 格式序列化时具有相同的行为<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute>应该应用到属性或字段相反。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute>

trans-unit.source: This is because the class will be serialized by using <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> instead of <xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为将使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>而不是<xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer>.</xref:System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer></xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>序列化类

trans-unit.source: You can also apply both ScriptIgnoreAttribute and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute> to a property or field.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以应用这两个 ScriptIgnoreAttribute 和<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute>属性或字段。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the property or field will be ignored for JSON and XML response formats.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，属性或字段中将忽略对 JSON 和 XML 响应格式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Script.Serialization.ScriptIgnoreAttribute"></xref> class.

Gets or set whether to override the <xref href="System.Web.Script.Serialization.ScriptIgnoreAttribute"></xref> so that the <xref href="System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer"></xref> will consider the serialization of the public property or public field.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置是否覆盖<xref href="System.Web.Script.Serialization.ScriptIgnoreAttribute"></xref>以便<xref href="System.Web.Script.Serialization.JavaScriptSerializer"></xref>将考虑公共属性或公共字段的序列化。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to override the <xref href="System.Web.Script.Serialization.ScriptIgnoreAttribute"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要重写<xref href="System.Web.Script.Serialization.ScriptIgnoreAttribute"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
